channel.title: CVE Feed for impleCode -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for impleCode -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-32558|2024-08-02T02:13:40.315Z -- implecode -- ecommerce%20product%20catalog
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in impleCode eCommerce Product Catalog allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects eCommerce Product Catalog: from n/a through 3.3.32.

item.title: CVE-2024-32437|2024-08-02T02:06:44.111Z -- implecode -- ecommerce%20product%20catalog
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in impleCode eCommerce Product Catalog.This issue affects eCommerce Product Catalog: from n/a through 3.3.28.

item.title: CVE-2024-32822|2024-06-04T17:51:22.736Z -- implecode -- reviews%20plus
